item.description:
Tuesday - Networking at 6:30, Meeting at 7:30, 15 East Broadway, Derry, NH - Directions - follow route 93 to exit 4, follow route 102 into Derry, take a right on Wall St., 2nd right into the lower parking lot, FDI is on the right.

Financial Destination, Inc. is a multi-million dollar, debt free financial solutions company based out of Derry, NH and they have systems in place that are taking care of America's 4 greatest concerns:


  • Debt and Finances
  • Restoring their credit score and protecting their identities
  • The Rising cost of Health Care
  • Creating residual income and generational wealth


To learn more about these powerful systems, come to an informational overview on Tuesday evening and meet the area Directors and find out how these systems can fit into YOUR life!

Call Bernadette to RSVP and with questions - 603-834-4587.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: FDI Overview
